title: Razor and the Wolves
description: Razor is in big trouble out in the Alaskan wilderness. His uncle took a nasty fall while out hiking and is unconscious and bleeding. Neither of their cell phones work. It's getting colder and a big storm is rolling in. Luckily, Razor's best friend Jake has a feeling something is wrong. Jake races to find a way to save his friend before time runs out.
